title: Drama, Drake & Disses!
itunes:title: Drama, Drake & Disses!
description:
WED 8/10 - DJ Drama joins The Breakfast Club to speak on the drama (potential Drake diss, beef squashing with DJ Envy) and the blessings (new album, artists Lil Uzi Vert & Lyquin, coming full circle since the raid). Speaking of drama, Trump fires at Hillary. Literal shots? Get the hee-haw ready...

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
